channel.title: Art on Refresh Annapolis Valley

item.title: f5://imagination
item.description: f5://imagination is a pop up exhibit focused on digital creativity. This one day temporary exhibit is seeking submissions from digital artists, makers, scratchers, computer scientists, engineers and pretendgineer, hardware hackers, lego robotics warriors, indy game developers, new media innovators, VR and AR pioneers… digital builders of all shapes, sizes, and credentials. We are accepting submissions in the following categories: Computer generated art Digital games Interactive story Digital gadgets and gizmos VR / AR environments Animation AI investigations Miscellaneous computer experiments f5://imagination serves as a platform for digital artistic experimentation.
